Articles.Content:
Hi,

Since 1.0 I can't seem to see the Time to apoapsis/perapsis timer in Map mode anymore. How do you bring it up?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T22:19:16Z" title="04/27/2015 10:19  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by Xionor**
If you're playing Career, you need to upgrade a building to get it (I believe it's the tracking station, i'm not sure, though)

> 
> Hi,
> Since 1.0 I can't seem to see the Time to apoapsis/perapsis timer in Map mode anymore. How do you bring it up?

you must upgrade the buildings for that in career.
